NeuroXR

A new reality for mental health care

Our team conducts advanced neuroscientific and psychological research funded by local and national organizations. This research utilizes XR technology to study brain mechanisms and conduct clinical research with our innovative mental health interventions.

Our lab is equipped with state-of-the-art technological resources and advanced expertise that can carry fresh ideas into advanced extended-reality programs. We actively seek collaborations with the medical, educational, and business communities that allow us to develop new ideas into practice.

Who We Are

The NeuroXR Collaborative is a multidisciplinary team that embraces advanced visual arts technology to develop innovative ways to assess and improve mental health through both research and development. We conduct research aimed at increasing the options for clinicians and patients to address mental health concerns through “extended reality” (XR), including virtual reality, augmented reality, and mixed reality programs. Our team and facilities are also designed to be a resource for investigators in Indiana and beyond who aim to develop new technology to improve physical or mental health as part of training, teaching, assessment, or therapy.
